report.title: UKBMS Recorder Names list
report.description: An list of text names used for the recorder names attribute entered by the user - this assummes Easy Login.
report.query: SELECT distinct snf.attr_full_name AS name FROM cache_samples_nonfunctional snf JOIN samples s on s.id=snf.id WHERE snf.attr_full_name is not null AND snf.attr_full_name<>''

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user
